alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Grand Forks, southern Nelson, northern Griggs, southeastern Eddy and northern Steele Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Golden Lake, or 37 miles southwest of Grand Forks, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwood, Golden Lake, Finley, Aneta, Binford, Red Willow Lake and Sharon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern and northeastern North Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele
